protocol.text: Plants were grown in long 16h days at 20 degrees celcius under white fluorescent light at 80-100umol m-2 sec-2. Mature seed was collected from dehisced siliques.  Levington seed compost  Intercept  I plant per P40 insert daily 20 °C average, 20 °C day, 20 °C night 80 % average, unknown % day, unknown % night
Labelled using protocol described in Affymetrix manual "3' IVT Express Kit User Manual"
Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA
Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.
Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system

Plants were grown in short 8h days at 20 degrees celcius under white fluorescent light at 80-100umol m-2 sec-2. Mature seed was collected from dehisced siliques.  Levington seed compost  Intercept  I plant per P40 insert daily 20 °C average, 20 °C day, 20 °C night 80 % average, unknown % day, unknown % night

Plants were grown to flowering in long 16h days at 20 degrees celcius under white fluorescent light at 80-100umol m-2 sec-2. After flowering the temperature was changed to 10 degrees celcius until maturity, other parameters were maintained. Mature seed was collected from dehisced siliques.  Levington seed compost  Intercept  I plant per P40 insert daily 10 °C average, 10 °C day, 10 °C night 80 % average, unknown % day, unknown % night
